Detailed Description

A manager monostate class that helps handle the sending and receiving of messages between entities.

void MessageManager::sendMessage ( int  _senderID,
int  _receiverID,
int  _message,
float  _extraInfo 
)

method to send a message from a sender to a reciever with any additional information

Parameters:
[in] _senderID the ID of the entity that wants to send a message
[in] _recieverID the ID of the entity that will receive the message
[in] _message the message type that will be sent
[in] _extraInfo information that is used by the reciever in a way specified by the message type
